oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Red River Dave performances - 1944-03-11 - WOR
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Various performance featuring Red River Dave (performer) and Bruce (host) [unconfirmed] on radio station WOR, Mutual Broadcasting System on March 11, 1944.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Red River Dave
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme (Red River Dave) -- Opening statement (Bruce) [unconfirmed] -- Red River Dave talks and introduces the first tune -- The Old Chisolm Trail (Red River Dave) -- Red River Dave talks about introduces the next tune -- The Same Little Word (Red River Dave) -- Red River Dave talks and introduces the next tune -- Take Me Back To My Boots And Saddle (Red River Dave) -- Red River Dave talks and introduces the next tune -- We'll Be Back This Coming Year (Red River Dave) -- Red River Dave talks and introduces the next tune -- Wagon Trail (Red Rive Dave) -- Red River Dave talks and introduces the next tune -- Tears On The Trail To Texas (Red River Dave) -- Closing theme (Red River Dave) -- Closing statement (Bruce) [unconfirmed]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Red River Dave, 1914-2002; WOR (Radio station : New York, N.Y.); Mutual Broadcasting System;
